channel.title: Dodian Help- I pay you
channel.description:
I need help adding some features to my server, im using dodian as my source.
I want to add a pk system,
Ability to pk anywhere Have a highscores that displays the person with the most kills Make it so teleblock spell works Make it so you cant log out or tele when being attacked Make it so once the user gets a certain amount of kills, they receive a item as a reward. Make it show if there in the wilderness part or safe part
So who ever can help me do this i would greatly appreciate it, and i would be willing to pay you and give you admin position on my server.

item.title: Dodian Help- I pay you

I need help adding some features to my server, im using dodian as my source.
